short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Assistant and Educator Toolkit, Built by Teachers for Teachers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A one-stop shop for educators looking to implement Artificial Intelligence into the classroom. This extension applies Pedagog.ai's ever-growing library of revolutionary teacher tools, allowing users to instantly generate custom lesson plans, adjust the reading level of any text sample, develop a school newsletter, and much more! Join the growing community of educators who are prepared to incorporate artificial intelligence and other modern technological solutions into their teaching and school communities. 

UPDATE (August 2024): Introducing a powerful new feature in our extension that works with ChatGPT and Claude to equip educators with a suite of AI-enhanced tools, including:

-Educator Prompt Library
-Personal Prompt Library
-Prompt Critiquer
-Suggest Next Prompt
-Export GPT Responses to a Google Doc
-Prompt Assembler 

Whether you're crafting custom lesson plans, modifying reading levels, or generating newsletters, these tools empower educators to harness AI for a modern and efficient teaching experience.

In addition, our extension now has a built-in AI comment tool, which uses a personalizable metric and focus points to comment on any writing sample on a Google Doc.

You can build: 

-Lesson Plans 
-Essay Prompts 
-Custom Games
-Unit Plans 
-Worksheets
-Vocab Lists
-Cover Letters
-Newsletters
-Email Responses
-Bloom's Taxonomy Scaffolder

AND MUCH MORE!

For a full list of teacher tools, to explore all of Pedagog.ai's Professional Development and tool libraries, or to become a member, please refer to our main site today.
